title: Sample headline 3: AI news event
summary_md:
- **What happened:** A notable development in the AI ecosystem.
- **Why it matters:** Potential to reshape industry dynamics across vendors.
- **What to watch:** Follow-on announcements, customer adoption, and benchmarks.
